name: Eight Mini Racers
description: 1 - 8 player local multiplayer 2D top-down racing game. Racing, rockets, mines, steering failure, engine failure, repair kits, speed boosts and up to 8 players.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP+ Processor: 2.0Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256MB DX9 (shader model 2.0) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 120 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0Ghz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB DX10 (shader model 3.0) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
